name: Attuned_Malice_of_the_Corruptor_F
display_name: Attuned Malice of the Corruptor F
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Malice of the Corruptor F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a 20% to inflict minor negative energy damage and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will trigger roughly 4 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Corruptors and may be slotted into any Corruptor damage power.
power_display_names: Malice of the Corruptor: Recharge/Chance for Negative Energy Damage
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for Negative Energy Damage
